short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In WingFTP's web client, you can use this extension for downloading multiple files/folders.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is for downloading multiple files/folders under WingFTP's web client.
Please check off the checkbox "Ask where to save each file before downloading" under Chrome Settings -> Downloads section.

The version 1.07 improves the download process. In the old version, download can't continue when popup interface closes or disappears.

The new version 1.08 fixes a few issues and supports 15 languages - English, Français, Deutsch, Italiano, Türkçe, Český, Română, Nederlands, Português, Español, 简体中文, 繁體中文, 日本語, 한국어, Polski.

If you can't download files/folders, please check the following things:
1. Do not modify the title tag for the file "webclient/main.html", keep it as "Wing FTP Server - Web Client".
2. When using HTTPS address, please use a signed SSL certificate for the web client.
3. Please make sure you have "File Read" permission under WingFTP, and these files are not denied in file access rules.
